class.rdfs:comment: Any rule set or interactive tool for estimating the risk of developing a complication or condition.
class.rdfs:label: MedicalRiskEstimator

schema:estimatesRiskOf.rdfs:comment: The condition, complication, or symptom whose risk is being estimated.
schema:estimatesRiskOf.rdfs:label: estimatesRiskOf

schema:includedRiskFactor.rdfs:comment: A modifiable or non-modifiable risk factor included in the calculation, e.g. age, coexisting condition.
schema:includedRiskFactor.rdfs:label: includedRiskFactor
